#>To get every nth element out of a list, use grep (one of the most under-appreciated built-ins?).

(For every fourth element in @List) grep {not ++$i % 4} @List; #(To skip every fifth element) grep {++$i % 5} (1..50) #Simple, but it makes a cool one-liner if you need it...
node.title: Get every nth element
